summary: Social websites such as Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, and GitHub have vast amounts of valuable insights lurking just beneath the surface, and this workshop minimizes the barriers to exploring and mining this valuable data by presenting turn-key examples from the thoroughly revised 2nd Edition of Mining the Social Web.
title: Mining Social Web APIs with IPython Notebook
